description: Ukrainian cottage cheese pancakes are perfectly fluffy and delicious with natural sweetness from raisins. these are fantastic served as a dessert with jam and sour cream.
name: Cottage Cheese Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cottage cheese, eggs, 115g of flour, sugar and salt in a large bowl and mix. Mix the vinegar and baking soda in a small bowl and stir into the batter.
Whisk the batter with a handheld electric mixer until you have a batter with a few cottage cheese clumps remaining. Stir through the raisins.

Place the rest of the flour on a plate and dollop a heaped tablespoon of batter on top. Sprinkle flour on top, shape into patties with your hands and set aside on a plate. Repeat with the rest of the batter and flour.

Heat the oil in a large non-stick pan on medium heat. Cook the patties in batches for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden and crisp, pushing down with the back of a spatula to flatten slightly. Serve with sour cream and jam on top.
